Georgia Website |footnotes = |pop_est_as_of = |pop_est_footnotes = |population_est = }} Bowdon is a city in Carroll County, Georgia, United States. As of the 2020 census, the city had a total population of 2,161. Bowdon is known as "The Friendly City." == References == Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state)
